strengths: Good variety of protein sources including salmon, chicken, and eggs supporting muscle preservation
Inclusion of omega-3 rich salmon and anti-inflammatory foods like blueberries and seaweed
Mix of whole foods with fiber sources from vegetables, fruits, and some whole grains
gaps: Inconsistent meal timing with skipped breakfasts and entire missing days affecting metabolic health
Limited colorful vegetables and polyphenol-rich foods - missing cruciferous vegetables, leafy greens, and diverse plant compounds
Likely insufficient daily fiber intake (target 30g+) and missing key longevity nutrients like magnesium from nuts/seeds
suggestions: Prep consistent breakfast options like overnight oats with berries, nuts, and protein powder to avoid skipping meals
Add 2-3 cups of colorful vegetables daily through meal prep - roasted broccoli, spinach salads, and bell peppers for polyphenols
